thread.title: j r

author: j r
title: j r
text:
re: M14R4005
In an effort to find a gift for my girlfriend's birthday, I scoured the web in search of the perfect watch. Finally, I came across an elegant black and gold Skagen on Jomashop. It was exactly what I was looking for and something I couldn't find elsewhere - including on the Skagen website. Furthermore, when compared to other Skagen products from other websites it was extremely good value - saving me money even after the cost of shipping and customs. Needless to say my girlfriend was delighted with her watch and I was delighted with the fantastic deal.
